game.name: Robot Squad Simulator 2017
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Become an elite pilot of special Robot Squad. Use specialized, remotely controlled robots, which you will control yourself. Deal with the hardest missions which can't be performed directly by people due to the conditions. Human life and safety is in your hands!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Become an elite pilot of special Robot Squad. Use specialized, remotely controlled robots, which you will control yourself. Deal with the hardest missions which can't be performed directly by people due to the conditions. Human life and safety is in your hands!

reviewHighlights.text: 생각보다 지루한 게임. 생각보다 화려하고 멋있고 빠르고 이런게 없음. 시뮬레이터는 시뮬레이터구나.
